translations: n.（Mitre）人名；（西、罗）米特雷；（英）迈特；（法）米特

sentences.sentence: Grubby white and blue crystal towers, cliffs and crevasses soar up from the water, dispatching millenniums of compacted snow in the shape of seals, water lilies and bishops' mitres.
sentences.translation: 水中高耸起污白和蓝色的水晶塔、峭壁和裂隙，将海豹、睡莲和主教冠的形状千年积雪推送出去。
